This dashboard aggregates data collected using the **DigIQ** to show how confident citizens are in their own digital competence, the knowledge they have about digital media and technology use, and   how they perform in this area.  

The monitor is divided into three main pages:  
[{{< iconify ph lightning-fill >}} Skills](skills.html), [{{< iconify ph book-open-fill >}} Knowledge](knowledge.html), and [{{< iconify ph clipboard-text >}} Performance](performance.html).

{{< iconify ph cursor-click-fill >}} Click on the hyperlinks above for quick navigation. Under **Dimensions** you can find a description of the 11 domains of digital competence.

For background information on the project and detailed wave reports, see the **More Info** menu in the top-right corner.
